member.name: T:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice
member.summary:
I/O Port device.
The I/O port device is a single device representing a single I/O port on one logical module on a sias instrument. In general the I/O Port device is sharing its logical module with other devices.
member.details:
\ingroup Dev_BottleSensor
The interface includes - the port number configuration property - the port value property - some synchronize able port setting method .
%SBottleSensorDevice class diagram
\image html "SBottleSensorDevice.png"

member.name: F:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice._WarningVolume
member.summary: Volume [ml] for reporting a warning field

member.name: F:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice._ErrorVolume
member.summary: Volume [ml] for reporting an error field

member.name: F:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.ValueTime
member.summary: value timer to avoid too fast reading

member.name: M:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor with XML configuration string parameter.

member.name: M:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.GetErrorInfos
member.summary: This interface function returns the default error messages which can be generated by this device.

member.name: M:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.HandleModuleError(System.Boolean,System.Object[])
member.summary: This method handles the module errors of SBottleSensorDevice devices.
member.details: Possible Module types: - 0x003C (\ref Sias::CanDev::eMODULE_TYPE_CONST "MT_BC_READER") . Handled errors: - 0x10 (\ref Sias::CanDev::eMODULE_ERROR_CONST "ME_RANGE_ERROR") at Error1 .
member.param: True to force the handler to handle the error

member.name: M:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.Init(Sias.BaseDev.SDeviceInitOptions)
member.summary:
Single motor initialization method.
Mostly this initialization method is not called if the motor device is a sub device of another device e.g. an arm device or an Y/Z devices.
member.param: Initialization options (Init level (PreInit, Init, PostInit, UserInit) and Init Group 0..7)

member.name: M:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.CheckBottleSensor(System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Check bottle sensor
This method check the bottle sensor. Depending on the given volume and the actual weight on bottle sensor it will report either a warning or an error. Error reportation may get deactivated to handle the problem on application side.
member.param: The volume limit for showing an error (0 to deactivate)
The volume limit for showing a warning (0 to deactivate)
member.returns: true if bottle sensor is ok otherwise false

member.name: M:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.SelectSensorForSetup
member.summary:
Select the sensor channel for setup
This method activates sensor setup for this channel. \n Important: It is not allowed to have more then one active

member.name: M:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.SetTarget1(System.Int16)
member.param: The volume of the container actually on the bottle sensor.

member.name: M:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.SetTarget2(System.Int16)
member.param: The volume of the container actually on the bottle sensor.

member.name: M:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.SetZero
member.summary:
Set Zero
This method defines the actual Volume as 0. \b Important: The methode will NOT change a scaling factor but "only" the volume offset.

member.name: M:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.TeachEmptyBottle(System.Int16)
member.summary: Teach empty bottle This method is used for teaching the empty bottle. \b Important: - The empty bottle requires to be placed on the bottle sensor before calling this method. - The SensorChannel property of the bottle sensor requires to be defined correctly. . \b Important:
member.param: The volume used for teaching (<=0 uses the bottle volume for teaching).\n This is requires for waste bottle sensors as the empty bottle defines the remaining volume for waste.\n This volume needs to be identical to the corresponding TeachFullBottle call.

member.name: M:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.TeachFullBottle(System.Int16)
member.summary: Teach full bottle This method is used for teaching the full bottle. \b Important: - The full bottle requires to be placed on the bottle sensor before calling this method. - The SensorChannel property of the bottle sensor requires to be defined correctly. .
member.param: The volume used for teaching (<=0 uses the bottle volume for teaching).\n This volume needs to be identical to the corresponding TeachFullBottle call.

member.name: M:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.StoreTeachingDataToFlash
member.summary:
Stor Teaching data to flash memory.
This is only required once for ALL sensors of one physical CAN module.

member.name: P:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.SensorChannel
member.summary:
Sensor channel
This setup property is only needed for sensor teaching and/or maintenance. Allowed values are - 0..7: to define an explicit sensor channel or - -1 to use the defautl sensor number from port number .

member.name: P:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.ValidatePort
member.summary:
Validation port value
Negative values will deactivate validation!

member.name: P:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.BottleVolume
member.summary:
Bottle volume property
This property is mainly used for teaching. It can also be used for verifications in custom application.

member.name: P:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.WarningVolume
member.summary:
Volume [ml] for reporting a warning property
This volume [ml] defines the limit for reporting a warning (using the Nelson error manager (see SErrorMonoder).

member.name: P:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.ErrorVolume
member.summary:
Volume [ml] for reporting an error property
This volume [ml] defines the limit for reporting an error (using the Nelson error manager (see SErrorMonoder).

member.name: P:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.RemainingVolume
member.summary:
Remaining Volume in bottle property
In case of system liquid or buffer bottles the sensor reports the remaining liquid volume in bottle. In case of Waste sensors it reports the remaining volume (space) in the bottle.

member.name: P:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.IsBottleAvailable
member.summary:
Bottle available property
This read only property reflects if there is a bottle available.
member.value: true if a bottle is recognized otherwise false.

member.name: P:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.IsBelowWarningVolume
member.summary:
Is below warning volume property
This property refelcts if the remaining liquid (or space) in the concerned bottle is below the defined warning volume.

member.name: P:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.IsBelowErrorVolume
member.summary:
Is below error volume property
This property refelcts if the remaining liquid (or space) in the concerned bottle is below the defined error volume.

member.name: T:Sias.BottleSensor.SBottleSensorDevice.ErrorCodes
member.summary: This static class keeps the error code constants of the \ref Sias::BottleSensor::SBottleSensorDevice errors.
